txt.en: 'It was a glorious battle, [placeholder]. One that shall be long remembered! The Orcs thought they could use trickery to gain the upper hand, but they could not stand in the face of our combined might.\n\n'Now, let us finish our business here and see what else we can do to push back these foul Orcs!'
'There is naught else to do here, so we should be off. Are you prepared to leave?'
Instance: The Battle of the Deep-way
You should speak to Brogur to see of what aid you might be in the coming battle.
Help hold the Deep-way against the Mazog's assault.
The warleader of the assault against the Deep-way has entered the battle. You must strike this Orc down and claim victory.
With Horngoth defeated, the battle of the Deep-way has been won. Speak to Brogur to see what else he would have you do.
Prevent a barricade from being overrun
Prevent a barricade from being overrun
You have travelled to the Deep-way to aid in its defence. Follow Brogur's direction and help the Dwarves of Moria make their stand.

'The barricades are set and my dwarves stand ready. All that must be done now is wait for the Orcs to come.

'I would ask that you follow the ebb and flow of the battle and aid where you are needed most. Also, do not forget to unfurl the banners of Khazad-d√ªm. They can help stir the hearts of all Free Peoples to great deeds and may even help turn the tide of battle. However, do not use them lightly, as once unfurled, a banner's strength is spent.

'Prepare yourself, as I fear it won't be long now...'
